metadata.Title: CVE-2020-24241 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In Netwide Assembler (NASM) 2.15rc10, there is heap use-after-free in saa_wbytes in nasmlib/saa.c.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-24241` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

nasm - 2.15.04-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: nasm package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.15.04-1').
